meaningMnemonic: All these <radical>flowers</radical> were planted by your <radical>leader</radical> with nothing but a <radical>spoon</radical>. Now the whole place is absolutely full with beautiful <kanji>flower</kanji>s. Flowers everywhere.
readingMnemonic: But for some reason, the leader just can't stop planting <kanji>flower</kanji>s... He's going crazy. Maybe it's the pollen? Now there’s only one person that can save him: <reading>Hannah</reading> (はな).
